title: Ebola vaccine tested on humans in UK trials
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Ebola vaccine tested on humans in UK trials 8 March 2017 Last updated at 06:55 GMT 
Researchers in UK are currently part of a worldwide effort to develop a vaccine for Ebola, so that itâ€™s ready should another outbreak occur. 
Our reporter Catrin Nye went to visit the Oxford Vaccine Group - a place where they are constantly looking for volunteers to trial new vaccines. Related Topics
